Docs.summary: Gets or sets the background gradient style of an annotation.
Docs.value: A value used to draw the annotation background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Two colors are used to draw the gradient fill; the primary color is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property and the secondary color is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Two colors are used to draw the hatching fill; the primary color is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property and the secondary color is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the secondary color of the annotation background.
Docs.value: A value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This secondary color is used with a primary color, defined with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PolygonAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
